name: Romulan Ale Fizz
preparation:
Romulan Ale is banned in the Federation, but that shouldn’t stop you from enjoying a Gin Fizz in characteristic cobalt. By all accounts, the Romulan Ale is quite strong, so don’t be shy of the navy-strength gin. The last thing you’d want is to come off as sheepish in the face of one of our oldest rivals.

This recipe originally appeared as part of “5 ‘Star Trek’ Cocktails to Try at Home.”

Chill a Collins glass with ice and set aside.

Add the gin, blue curaçao, juice, syrup and egg white into a shaker, and dry-shake (without ice) to emulsify the egg.

Add ice, and shake until well-chilled.

Strain into the prepared glass.

Top with the tonic water and orange blossom water.
